title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs with a single command-line tool; includes REST API, model library, and Docker images.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers (via fetch).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; no API keys needed.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI chatbot, Next.js UI, model fine-tuning, GitHub Actions CI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Docker compose templates for running Ollama with NVIDIA runtime and CUDA drivers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index to chat over PDFs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers prompts using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for iOS/macOS apps wanting local LLM inference via Ollama.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 GPU instances with CloudWatch logging.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated datasets and evaluation scripts for benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama via REST with session memory.

title: ollama-github-action
summary: GitHub Action to spin up Ollama service inside CI for testing code-generation prompts.
